creator: javasun@time.net.my
text:
I have tried with some reporting with the multi pages.

There is a problem where the footer of the table of each keep 
showing total of the columns value instead of showing at the last page. 
Example - http://www.geocities.com/wikey321/gen.pdf

I understand that XEP fo processor provide the solution but i would 
like to use Apache FOP which recommended by Altova.

Thanks,
Anson.

text: related to REC 1.1/6.13.7 - fo:retrieve-table-marker, not yet implemented
